rewards.description: Viewers will receive a SMITE 2 Game access key after one hour spent viewing a participating channel (One per twitch account. If you have claimed a key in a previous drop you will be unable to claim another in any future campaign) and 25 SMITE 2 Legacy Gems and 2000 SMITE 1 Viewer Points for each two hours spent viewing participating streams from December 24, 2024 until December 31, 2024 at 12:00 UTC. Rewards must be claimed while the Twitch Campaign is running in order to be received.
rewards.name: CA8 Drops Week 3

rewards.description: 🎮 Announcing Kakele Online's Epic Twitch Drops!  Embark on a unique journey in Kakele's realm. Dive into mystical lands, conquer quests, and enjoy our exciting Twitch Drops for enhanced gaming. Unlock rewards, including teleports, herbs, potions, and materials.  🕒 Timed Rewards: Enjoy cities Teleports, Ultra potions, Gold Refiner Kits and collect Dog Cards and Trophies.  💰 Prosperity Path: Gain Copper, Tin, Silver, Iron, Gold, Life Herbs, Mana Herbs for success. Accumulate Reputation Coins.  🎈 Grand Finale: End with an exclusive Twitch Drop and Bacon Extravaganza surprise! Link accounts, watch streams, and claim rewards for an unforgettable RPG experience.  🌟 How to Join:  Link Accounts: Connect your account and Twitch in the game app. Watch Streams: Tune in during to your favorite Kakele streamer. Claim Rewards: Receive Twitch Drop notifications claim in the game app.  Influencers: To enable drops on your stream, email us!  Don't miss the chance to enrich your journey with Twitch Drops!
rewards.name: Kakele Online December 2

rewards.description: Watch Twitch Streams to get a unique 'I'm the Gift' Emote [2 hours] and 'Excited Heart' Emote [4 hours]!

rewards.description: Subscribe or Gift a Sub to your favorite opted-in Destiny 2 streamer and receive the Tabula Rasa Emblem! This Emblem will be available from 10 December at 9AM PT until 31 December at 9AM PT, throughout The Dawning. You must link your Bungie account to Twitch to receive the Emblem. You can redeem the Emblem by logging into your Bungie.net account and going to the Partner Rewards section of the Code Redemption area.
rewards.name: D2 - Dawning Creator Subs

rewards.description:

Follow the instructions below to unlock 
1. Go to https://accounts.atoma.cloud/twitch-drops and sign in to your Steam/PSN/ Windows PC/XBOX account.  2. Here please link your Darktide account with your Twitch account. 
3. Once linked, start watching a participating channel to unlock the rewards!
